game
Class World

java.lang.Object
  game.World
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, Visualisable
public class World
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, Visualisable

The top level game class that is used by other packages to interact with the Symbibots world model.

Author:
Matt Oates
